notes: Full-size sedan final years (1992-2011). Last Mercury produced. Panther platform discontinued with brand. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercury Grand Marquis article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation midsize sedan (2010-2011). Ford Fusion twin. Hybrid available. Brand discontinued 2011. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercury Milan article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation compact crossover (2008-2011). Ford Escape twin. Hybrid available. Final Mercury SUV. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercury Mariner article, January 2025 revision.
Third generation midsize SUV final years (2006-2010). Ford Explorer twin. V8 discontinued 2009. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercury Mountaineer article, January 2025 revision.
